game

Class Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Data

  • public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used by the Player to query information about the game.
    Version:
    1.0 - January 11th 2024
    Author:
    Tommy Shan

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        public Point getPosition()
        getPosition Gets the position of the player.
        Returns:
        a Point object which represents the player's current location

      • query

        public QueryData query(Point target)
        query Makes a query centered at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        target - the origin of the query
        Returns:
        a QueryData object containing information about all the enemy players and currency in the square centered at target with radius Player.getRange()

      • query

        public QueryData query(int targetX,
                       int targetY)
        query Makes a query centered at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        targetX - the x coordinate of the point
        targetY - the y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        a QueryData object containing information about all the enemy players and currency in the square centered at target with radius Player.getRange()

      • getEnemyLocation

        public Point getEnemyLocation(int nClosest)
        getEnemyLocation Gets the location of the nClosest closest enemy from the player.
        Parameters:
        nClosest - the nth closest enemy from the player
        Returns:
        the location of the enemy as a Point

        Returns:
